# isOutstanding

**Instance Property**

A Boolean indicating whether payment is still outstanding.

## Declaration

```swift
var isOutstanding: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when your ride service is still waiting for payment from the user. It is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] after the user successfully paid for the ride. The method you use to create an instance of this class automatically sets the value of this property.

## Getting the Status Information

- **isCompleted**: A Boolean value indicating whether the ride completed successfully.
- **isCanceled**: A Boolean value indicating whether someone canceled the ride for any reason.
- **isMissedPickup**: A Boolean value indicating whether someone canceled the ride because the user was never picked up.
- **paymentAmount**: The amount paid or still outstanding for the ride.
